about_the_game:
IMPORTANT: ​ Due to issues with the core gameplay, this project has been postponed indefinitely.


Blast off into space! Help Monica and her team explore the galaxy, fight off hordes of enemies, and clean up the mysterious cosmic gel in this retro-arcade inspired action shooter!

To The Stars!

The planet of Mythandra is under attack! Your team has been assigned by Railway Industries to clean up the mysterious gel that's plaguing the planet, as well as deal with alien invaders. Your mission will take you around the galaxy, but what secrets lie out there in deep space...

Clear The Way!

Fight off endless formations of enemies while traveling between various worlds. Get powerups, upgrade your blaster, and square off against huge bosses. Enemies will be merciless with their attacks, but there's more than one way to defend against them!

Dodge Bullets? Nah, Block Them!

Using the Gel Spreader, you can block incoming bullets. Or, grab the Deflector and repel bullets away! There's many ways to handle incoming enemy attacks. Or, if you prefer , enable Shmup Mode to move at half speed and dodge enemy attacks with high precision!

Features

  • Retro-inspired graphics with a faithful 8bit soundtrack (2A03+VRC6)
  • Various upgrades for your blaster that change your shot type, as well as firing missiles.
  • Special moves you can swap out, which allow you to fire gel to protect yourself, or deflect enemy bullets back at them!
  • Several different gameplay modes that challenge you in different ways. How fast can you clear 20 formations? How many can you clear in 2 minutes?
  • Team up with a friend for 2 player* co-op, or compete against each other!
  • Bonus fun modes like shooting balloons, or the Freedraw Canvas, which allows you to draw your own art!
  • Different screen borders, aspect ratios, and TATE mode. Play the game however you like!
  • Difficulty adjustment and dynamic difficulty. The game will automatically adjust itself to your skill level.
  • Several other options, including accessibility options and input remapping.
*2 player is local only. Requires a gamepad and keyboard, or two gamepads.
